definitions: in a way that demonstrates a sensible and practical idea of what can be achieved or expected

examples.text: how well can each candidate realistically expect to do?
realistically, at his age opportunities are few and far between

shortDefinitions: in way that demonstrates sensible and practical idea of what can be achieved or expected

definitions: in a way that is accurate and true to life

examples.text: this film realistically simulates the effects that a nuclear war could have
Cubist artists did not try to paint realistically

shortDefinitions: in way that is accurate and true to life
